^(enableGhost)$.description: Whether to use gh-ost for online schema migration.

^(enablePriorBackup)$.description: If set, a backup of the modified data will be created automatically before any changes are applied.

enable_ghost.description: Whether to use gh-ost for online schema migration.

enable_prior_backup.description: If set, a backup of the modified data will be created automatically before any changes are applied.

release.description:
The resource name of the release.
 Format: projects/{project}/releases/{release}

sheet.description:
The resource name of the sheet.
 Format: projects/{project}/sheets/{sheet}

targets.description:
The list of targets.
 Multi-database format: [instances/{instance-id}/databases/{database-name}].
 Single database group format: [projects/{project}/databaseGroups/{databaseGroup}].
